snippet: The Pentagon is investigating Saturday’s crash, in which no one was hurt, and officials said that damage to the two ships involved was being evaluated.
abstract: Pentagon is investigating collision between Navy nuclear submarine and Aegis cruiser during training exercises off East Coast; crash results in no injuries and both ships are able to continue to operate under their own power.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon is investigating Saturday’s crash, in which no one was hurt, and officials said that damage to the two ships involved was being evaluated.

headline.seo: Navy Nuclear Sub Collides Off East Coast, Prompting Inquiry
headline.main: Collision of Navy Ships Prompts Pentagon Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Two Navy Ships Collide During East Coast Exercise

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
